name: Crimson Guard
lore: A cuirass originally built to protect against the dreaded Year Beast.

descriptions.name: Guard
descriptions.description: For 12 seconds, grant nearby allied heroes and buildings +2 armor, and a 100% chance to block 60 damage from each incoming attack.Units may only be affected by Guard once every 46.0 seconds.Radius: 900

descriptions.name: Damage Block
descriptions.description: Grants a 50% chance to block 70 damage on melee heroes, and 35 damage on ranged.

notes: Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.
